definition: tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)

sentences.english: He has his own set way of doing things.
Every day, and women officers would be physically hurt?
sentences.chinese: 天天和女人幹事會對身體有傷害嗎？

sentences.english: In short, he was being paid to serve as a propagandist.
sentences.chinese: 總之，他是一個拿工資的宣傳幹事。

sentences.english: The stewards will inspect the course to see if racing is possible.
sentences.chinese: 那些幹事將檢視賽馬場看是否適宜比賽。

sentences.english: Here is the new stem with machining work aplenty.
sentences.chinese: 這是有機械加工新幹事實在不少。

sentences.english: In 2007, she became the Vice President of the ministry.
sentences.chinese: 在2007年成爲佈道團的副總幹事。

sentences.english: WHO Director-General Dr Margaret Chan will open the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 世衛組織總幹事陳馮富珍博士將宣佈會議開幕。

sentences.english: It's ironic that the weakest student in mathematics was elected class treasurer.
sentences.chinese: 數學最差的學生竟被選爲班級財務幹事，真是諷刺。

sentences.english: The Assembly will consider the Board's nomination, and appoint a Director-General.
sentences.chinese: 大會將審議執委會的提名和任命總幹事。

sentences.english: At that time, the responsible person of the station was Li Liankui, the communication chief.
sentences.chinese: 當時交通站的負責人是縣委宣傳幹事李聯奎。

sentences.english: Fu Cong, a Chinese national, is adviser to the Director-General.
sentences.chinese: 傅聰，中國籍，任總幹事顧問。

sentences.english: David Gordon is Executive Director at Pacific Environment.
sentences.chinese: 大衛戈頓是太平洋環境組織的總幹事。

sentences.english: The participant whose pipe extinguishes will immediately hand over his time-registration card to the steward.
sentences.chinese: 煙火熄滅，須立即將計時卡交予幹事登記。

sentences.english: The Director General shall register this Act with the Secretariat of the United Nations.
sentences.chinese: 總幹事應將本議定書交聯合國祕書處登記。

sentences.english: Yukiya Amano, the International Atomic Energy Agency's director general, said the situation was "very serious".
sentences.chinese: 國際原子能機構總幹事天野之彌說情況“非常緊急”。

definition: (political, economic etc) affairs/work/transaction (as in a computer database)
head of a (government etc) department/section chief/section head/secretary/minister/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]
